title: MoonRise Tokenomics
intro: MoonRise was designed with a structure to ensure balance, transparency, and sustainable growth. No token was distributed for free — everything was planned with purpose, strategy, and long-term vision.
distributionNote: Every fraction of the supply was allocated with purpose. No leftovers, no accidents — only strategy and execution.
fundsText: All raised funds are allocated transparently and traceably. The priority is to generate value, ensure stability, and drive ecosystem growth.

funds.title: MoonRise Ecosystem
funds.desc: Automatic reinvestment in infrastructure, liquidity, validation, and ecosystem expansion. Every transaction feeds the machine that powers the empire.

funds.title: Stability Reserves
funds.desc: Protection fund to maintain liquidity and support price during high volatility.

funds.title: Market Liquidity
funds.desc: Ensures smooth movement and continuous support for the token chart.

funds.title: Holder Appreciation
funds.desc: Part of the profits is reinvested to benefit loyal holders.

closing.phrase: MoonRise was built on execution, data, and long-term vision. The very use of the system drives growth, with fees reinvested in liquidity and sustainable value.
